sentences.english: Your eyes were kindled in the upper skies.
sentences.chinese: 你的双眸被点燃在苍穹之上。

sentences.english: Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream.
sentences.chinese: 睁开双眸，耶，不过碎梦一场。
轻柔地合上你的似水双眸。

sentences.english: My mother's eyes are luminous, glistened pearls.
sentences.chinese: 母亲的双眸明亮，如光彩闪亮的珍珠。

sentences.english: What I understood your eyes, your care.
sentences.chinese: 更让我读懂了你的双眸，你的关怀。

sentences.english: What I needed was to be caressed by Fanfan's gentle gaze.
sentences.chinese: 我需要的是芳芳温柔双眸的爱抚。

sentences.english: Dyed all thy liquid light with blood and tears.
sentences.chinese: 血和泪浸透了你清澈的双眸。

sentences.english: As I sat next to her on the sofa, I stared at her soft eyes. wishing she was mine.
sentences.chinese: 看着她温柔的双眸，我希望她是属于我的。

sentences.english: Shining tears in the eyes, reflected in your room dark brown eyes.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁着泪花的眼，倒映在你黑褐色的双眸间。

sentences.english: From there it comes to kiss baby's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 它从那儿飞来，轻吻着婴儿的双眸。

sentences.english: For Lovely eys, Seek out the good in people.
sentences.chinese: 想拥有迷人的双眸，请多探寻别人的优点。

sentences.english: Its unique prescription can effectively stimulate the growth of eyelash, as well as further enhance the expressions in our eyes.
sentences.chinese: 设有独特配方，令睫毛有增长效果，使双眸更显神采。

sentences.english: And her eyes on all my motions with a mute observance hung.
sentences.chinese: 她的双眸沉默而拘谨地牵挂着我的一举一动。

sentences.english: Mikazuki has a pair of furious red eyes.
sentences.chinese: 看她那对愤怒的红色双眸。

sentences.english: I keep getting lost in your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我不断迷失在妳的双眸。
